title-part.text: SPRAYING APPARATUS
ATOMISING APPARATUS
NOZZLES

CPC-specific-text.text: sprayers or atomisers specially adapted for therapeutic purposes A61M11/00

reference.text: ; spray-mixers with nozzles B01F5/20 ; processes for applying liquids or other fluent materials to surfaces by spraying B05D;

CPC-specific-text.text: nozzles specially adapted for injection moulding of plastics or substances in a plastic state B29C45/1603 , B29C45/20 ; nozzles specially adapted for windscreen washers B60S1/52

reference.text: ; means for pumping fluids F04; valves, e.g. water-taps, F16K

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers particularly apparatus for the release or projection of drops or droplets into the atmosphere or into a chamber to form a mist or the like. For this purpose, the materials to be projected may be suspended in a stream of gas or vapour.
Attention is drawn to the Note following the title of class B05.
In this subclass, "means for controlling volume of flow" is used in the most general meaning and includes also means allowing only starting and stopping the flow

In this subclass, the meaning of the expression "apparatus carried on or by a person" includes all apparatus comprising at least one container for the material to be sprayed carried on or by a person during use
In this subclass, the word "container" is to be understood as the innermost enclosure containing the material to be sprayed
Groups B05B11/30 to B05B11/3098 do not correspond to former or current IPC groups. The concordance CPC : IPC for these groups is as follows: - B05B11/30 - 11/30V : B05B11/00

title-part.text: Nozzles, spray heads or other outlets, with or without auxiliary devices such as valves, heating means
